channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Financial Products Subledger and Banking Services) (FSAPPL)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP S/4 HANA (Financial Products Subledger and Banking Services) (FSAPPL)

item.title: CVE-2020-6233|2024-08-04T08:55:22.311Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20s%2F4%20hana%20%28financial%20products%20subledger%20and%20banking%20services%29%20%28fsappl%29
item.description: SAP S/4 HANA (Financial Products Subledger and Banking Services), versions - FSAPPL 400, 450, 500 and S4FPSL 100, allows an authenticated user to run an analysis report due to Missing Authorization Check, resulting in slowing the system.
